s0001.literal: Zhang Er, his person Daliang person.
s0001.idiomatic: Zhang Er, his person Daliang person.

s0002.chinese: 其少時，及魏公子毋忌為客。
s0002.literal: His youth time, with Wei crown prince Wu Ji as guest.
s0002.idiomatic: His youth time, with Wei crown prince Wu Ji as guest.

s0003.literal: Zhang Er once fled life wandered Waihuang.
s0003.idiomatic: Zhang Er once fled life wandered Waihuang.

s0004.chinese: 外黃富人女甚美，嫁庸奴，亡其夫，去抵父客。
s0004.literal: Waihuang rich person daughter very beautiful, married common slave, fled her husband, went returned father guest.
s0004.idiomatic: Waihuang rich person daughter very beautiful, married common slave, fled her husband, went returned father guest.

s0005.chinese: 父客素知張耳，乃謂女曰：「必欲求賢夫，從張耳。」
s0005.literal: Father guest originally knew Zhang Er, then told daughter: 'Certainly wish seek worthy husband, follow Zhang Er.'
s0005.idiomatic: Father guest originally knew Zhang Er, then told daughter: 'Certainly wish seek worthy husband, follow Zhang Er.'

s0006.chinese: 女聽，乃卒為請決，嫁之張耳。
s0006.literal: Daughter listened, then finally for him plead decision, married Zhang Er.
s0006.idiomatic: Daughter listened, then finally for him plead decision, married Zhang Er.

s0007.chinese: 張耳是時脫身游，女家厚奉給張耳，張耳以故致千里客。
s0007.literal: Zhang Er at time escaped body wandered, daughter family thick provided gave Zhang Er, Zhang Er because this attracted thousand li guests.
s0007.idiomatic: Zhang Er at time escaped body wandered, daughter family thick provided gave Zhang Er, Zhang Er because this attracted thousand li guests.

s0008.literal: Then served Wei as Waihuang magistrate.
s0008.idiomatic: Then served Wei as Waihuang magistrate.

s0010.chinese: 陳餘者，亦大梁人也，好儒術，數游趙苦陘。
s0010.literal: Chen Yu, also Daliang person, loved Confucian arts, several times wandered Zhao Ku Xing.
s0010.idiomatic: Chen Yu, also Daliang person, loved Confucian arts, several times wandered Zhao Ku Xing.

s0011.chinese: 富人公乘氏以其女妻之，亦知陳餘非庸人也。
s0011.literal: Rich person Gongcheng clan with his daughter wife him, also knew Chen Yu not common person.
s0011.idiomatic: Rich person Gongcheng clan with his daughter wife him, also knew Chen Yu not common person.

s0012.chinese: 餘年少，父事張耳，兩人相與為刎頸交。
s0012.literal: Yu young, father treated Zhang Er, two persons mutually became neck-cutting friendship.
s0012.idiomatic: Yu young, father treated Zhang Er, two persons mutually became neck-cutting friendship.

s0013.chinese: 秦之滅大梁也，張耳家外黃。
s0013.literal: Qin extinguished Daliang, Zhang Er family Waihuang.
s0013.idiomatic: Qin extinguished Daliang, Zhang Er family Waihuang.

s0014.chinese: 高祖為布衣時，嘗數從張耳游，客數月。
s0014.literal: Gao Zu as commoner time, once several times followed Zhang Er wandered, guest several months.
s0014.idiomatic: Gao Zu as commoner time, once several times followed Zhang Er wandered, guest several months.

s0015.chinese: 秦滅魏數歲，已聞此兩人魏之名士也，購求有得張耳千金，陳餘五百金。
s0015.literal: Qin extinguished Wei several years, already heard these two persons Wei name scholars, purchased sought got Zhang Er thousand gold, Chen Yu five hundred gold.
s0015.idiomatic: Qin extinguished Wei several years, already heard these two persons Wei name scholars, purchased sought got Zhang Er thousand gold, Chen Yu five hundred gold.

s0016.chinese: 張耳、陳餘乃變名姓，俱之陳，為里監門以自食。
s0016.literal: Zhang Er, Chen Yu then changed name surname, together went Chen, became village gatekeeper to self support.
s0016.idiomatic: Zhang Er, Chen Yu then changed name surname, together went Chen, became village gatekeeper to self support.

s0018.chinese: 里吏嘗有過笞陳餘，陳餘欲起，張耳躡之，使受笞。
s0018.literal: Village official once had error flogged Chen Yu, Chen Yu wished rise, Zhang Er stepped on him, made receive flog.
s0018.idiomatic: Village official once had error flogged Chen Yu, Chen Yu wished rise, Zhang Er stepped on him, made receive flog.

s0019.chinese: 吏去，張耳乃引陳餘之桑下而數之曰：「始吾與公言何如？
s0019.literal: Official gone, Zhang Er then led Chen Yu to mulberry below counted him: 'Beginning I with you speak what like?
s0019.idiomatic: Official gone, Zhang Er then led Chen Yu to mulberry below counted him: 'Beginning I with you speak what like?

s0020.chinese: 今見小辱而欲死一吏乎？」
s0020.literal: Now see small humiliation wish die one official?'
s0020.idiomatic: Now see small humiliation wish die one official?'

s0022.chinese: 秦詔書購求兩人，兩人亦反用門者以令里中。
s0022.literal: Qin decree book purchased sought two persons, two persons also instead used gatekeeper to command village middle.
s0022.idiomatic: Qin decree book purchased sought two persons, two persons also instead used gatekeeper to command village middle.

s0023.chinese: 陳涉起蘄，至入陳，兵數萬。
s0023.literal: Chen She rose Qi, arrived entered Chen, troops several ten thousand.
s0023.idiomatic: Chen She rose Qi, arrived entered Chen, troops several ten thousand.

s0024.literal: Zhang Er, Chen Yu up met Chen She.
s0024.idiomatic: Zhang Er, Chen Yu up met Chen She.

s0025.chinese: 涉及左右生平數聞張耳、陳餘賢，未嘗見，見即大喜。
s0025.literal: She involved left right lifetime several heard Zhang Er, Chen Yu worthy, not tasted see, see then greatly happy.
s0025.idiomatic: She involved left right lifetime several heard Zhang Er, Chen Yu worthy, not tasted see, see then greatly happy.

s0026.chinese: 陳中豪傑父老乃說陳涉曰：「將軍身被堅執銳，率士卒以誅暴秦，復立楚社稷，存亡繼絕，功德宜為王。
s0026.literal: Chen middle heroes elders then persuaded Chen She: 'General body wore armor grasped sharp weapons, led soldiers to execute violent Qin, restored established Chu altars of soil, preserved perished continued severed, merit virtue should become king.
s0026.idiomatic: Chen middle heroes elders then persuaded Chen She: 'General body wore armor grasped sharp weapons, led soldiers to execute violent Qin, restored established Chu altars of soil, preserved perished continued severed, merit virtue should become king.

s0027.chinese: 且夫監臨天下諸將，不為王不可，願將軍立為楚王也。」
s0027.literal: Moreover monitor oversee world various generals, not become king cannot, wish general establish as Chu king.'
s0027.idiomatic: Moreover monitor oversee world various generals, not become king cannot, wish general establish as Chu king.'

s0028.chinese: 陳涉問此兩人，兩人對曰：「夫秦為無道，破人國家，滅人社稷，絕人後世，罷百姓之力，盡百姓之財。
s0028.literal: Chen She asked these two persons, two persons replied: 'Chu for no way, broke person states, extinguished person altars of soil, severed person posterity, exhausted hundred surnames strength, used up hundred surnames wealth.
s0028.idiomatic: Chen She asked these two persons, two persons replied: 'Chu for no way, broke person states, extinguished person altars of soil, severed person posterity, exhausted hundred surnames strength, used up hundred surnames wealth.

s0029.chinese: 將軍瞋目張膽，出萬死不顧一生之計，為天下除殘也。
s0029.literal: General glared eyes stretched courage, out ten thousand deaths not regard one life plan, for world remove cruelty.
s0029.idiomatic: General glared eyes stretched courage, out ten thousand deaths not regard one life plan, for world remove cruelty.

s0030.chinese: 今始至陳而王之，示天下私。
s0030.literal: Now beginning arrived Chen then king it, show world private.
s0030.idiomatic: Now beginning arrived Chen then king it, show world private.

s0031.chinese: 願將軍毋王，急引兵而西，遣人立六國後，自為樹黨，為秦益敵也。
s0031.literal: Wish general no king, urgent led troops west, sent people establish six states posterity, self for tree party, for Qin increase enemy.
s0031.idiomatic: Wish general no king, urgent led troops west, sent people establish six states posterity, self for tree party, for Qin increase enemy.

s0032.chinese: 敵多則力分，與眾則兵彊。
s0032.literal: Enemy many then strength divide, with masses then troops strong.
s0032.idiomatic: Enemy many then strength divide, with masses then troops strong.

s0033.chinese: 如此野無交兵，縣無守城，誅暴秦，據咸陽以令諸侯。
s0033.literal: Like this wilderness no intersect battle, county no guard city, execute violent Qin, occupy Xianyang to command feudal lords.
s0033.idiomatic: Like this wilderness no intersect battle, county no guard city, execute violent Qin, occupy Xianyang to command feudal lords.

s0034.chinese: 諸侯亡而得立，以德服之，如此則帝業成矣。
s0034.literal: Feudal lords perished then got establish, with virtue subdue them, like this then imperial enterprise complete.
s0034.idiomatic: Feudal lords perished then got establish, with virtue subdue them, like this then imperial enterprise complete.

s0035.literal: Now alone king Chen, fear world dissolve.'
s0035.idiomatic: Now alone king Chen, fear world dissolve.'

s0036.literal: Chen She not listened, then established as king.
s0036.idiomatic: Chen She not listened, then established as king.

s0037.chinese: 陳餘乃復說陳王曰：「大王舉梁、楚而西，務在入關，未及收河北也。
s0037.literal: Chen Yu then again persuaded Chen king: 'Great king raised Liang, Chu west, focused in enter pass, not reached collect Hebei.
s0037.idiomatic: Chen Yu then again persuaded Chen king: 'Great king raised Liang, Chu west, focused in enter pass, not reached collect Hebei.

s0038.chinese: 臣嘗游趙，知其豪桀及地形，願請奇兵北略趙地。」
s0038.literal: Minister once wandered Zhao, knew its heroes terrain, wish ask odd troops north attack Zhao land.'
s0038.idiomatic: Minister once wandered Zhao, knew its heroes terrain, wish ask odd troops north attack Zhao land.'

s0039.chinese: 於是陳王以故所善陳人武臣為將軍，邵騷為護軍，以張耳、陳餘為左右校尉，予卒三千人，北略趙地。
s0039.literal: Then Chen king with formerly good Chen person Wu Chen as general, Shao Sao as protect army, with Zhang Er, Chen Yu as left right colonel, gave troops three thousand, north attack Zhao land.
s0039.idiomatic: Then Chen king with formerly good Chen person Wu Chen as general, Shao Sao as protect army, with Zhang Er, Chen Yu as left right colonel, gave troops three thousand, north attack Zhao land.

s0040.chinese: 武臣等從白馬渡河，至諸縣，說其豪桀曰：「秦為亂政虐刑以殘賊天下，數十年矣。
s0040.literal: Wu Chen etc. from Baima crossed river, to various counties, persuaded their heroes: 'Qin for chaotic government cruel punishments to harm world, several ten years.
s0040.idiomatic: Wu Chen etc. from Baima crossed river, to various counties, persuaded their heroes: 'Qin for chaotic government cruel punishments to harm world, several ten years.

s0041.chinese: 北有長城之役，南有五嶺之戍，外內騷動，百姓罷敝，頭會箕斂，以供軍費，財匱力盡，民不聊生。
s0041.literal: North has long wall labor, south has five ridges garrison, outside inside disturbed, hundred surnames exhausted worn, head meeting basket collection, to supply army expenses, wealth depleted strength exhausted, people not live.
s0041.idiomatic: North has long wall labor, south has five ridges garrison, outside inside disturbed, hundred surnames exhausted worn, head meeting basket collection, to supply army expenses, wealth depleted strength exhausted, people not live.

s0042.chinese: 重之以苛法峻刑，使天下父子不相安。
s0042.literal: Heavy with harsh laws severe punishments, made world fathers sons not peaceful.
s0042.idiomatic: Heavy with harsh laws severe punishments, made world fathers sons not peaceful.

s0043.chinese: 陳王奮臂為天下倡始，王楚之地，方二千里，莫不響應，家自為怒，人自為鬬，各報其怨而攻其讎，縣殺其令丞，郡殺其守尉。
s0043.literal: Chen king waved arm for world pioneer, occupied Chu land, square two thousand li, none not respond, family self anger, person self fight, each report their resentment attack their enemies, county kill their magistrate assistant, commandery kill their guard captain.
s0043.idiomatic: Chen king waved arm for world pioneer, occupied Chu land, square two thousand li, none not respond, family self anger, person self fight, each report their resentment attack their enemies, county kill their magistrate assistant, commandery kill their guard captain.

s0044.chinese: 今已張大楚，王陳，使吳廣、周文將卒百萬西擊秦。
s0044.literal: Now already spread great Chu, king Chen, made Wu Guang, Zhou Wen lead troops hundred thousand west attack Qin.
s0044.idiomatic: Now already spread great Chu, king Chen, made Wu Guang, Zhou Wen lead troops hundred thousand west attack Qin.

s0045.chinese: 於此時而不成封侯之業者，非人豪也。
s0045.literal: At this time not become seal marquis achievers, not person hero.
s0045.idiomatic: At this time not become seal marquis achievers, not person hero.

s0046.literal: Various lords try mutually plan it!
s0046.idiomatic: Various lords try mutually plan it!

s0047.chinese: 夫天下同心而苦秦久矣。
s0047.literal: World same heart suffered Qin long.
s0047.idiomatic: World same heart suffered Qin long.

s0048.chinese: 因天下之力而攻無道之君，報父兄之怨而成割地有土之業，此士之一時也。」
s0048.literal: Because world strength attack no way lord, report fathers brothers resentment become divide land have soil enterprise, this scholar one time.'
s0048.idiomatic: Because world strength attack no way lord, report fathers brothers resentment become divide land have soil enterprise, this scholar one time.'

s0050.chinese: 乃行收兵，得數萬人，號武臣為武信君。
s0050.literal: Then went collect troops, got several ten thousand persons, titled Wu Chen as Wu Xin Jun.
s0050.idiomatic: Then went collect troops, got several ten thousand persons, titled Wu Chen as Wu Xin Jun.

s0051.chinese: 下趙十城，餘皆城守，莫肯下。
s0051.literal: Down Zhao ten cities, remainder all walled guarded, none willing down.
s0051.idiomatic: Down Zhao ten cities, remainder all walled guarded, none willing down.

s0052.literal: Then led troops northeast attacked Fanyang.
s0052.idiomatic: Then led troops northeast attacked Fanyang.

s0053.chinese: 范陽人蒯通說范陽令曰：「竊聞公之將死，故弔。
s0053.literal: Fanyang person Kuai Tong persuaded Fanyang magistrate: 'Secretly heard lord will die, thus condole.
s0053.idiomatic: Fanyang person Kuai Tong persuaded Fanyang magistrate: 'Secretly heard lord will die, thus condole.

s0054.literal: Although so, congratulate lord got Tong live.'
s0054.idiomatic: Although so, congratulate lord got Tong live.'

s0055.literal: Fanyang magistrate said: 'With what condole it?'
s0055.idiomatic: Fanyang magistrate said: 'With what condole it?'

s0056.chinese: 對曰：「秦法重，足下為范陽令十年矣，殺人之父，孤人之子，斷人之足，黥人之首，不可勝數。
s0056.literal: Replied: 'Qin law heavy, your excellency as Fanyang magistrate ten years, killed person father, orphaned person son, broke person feet, tattooed person head, cannot count.
s0056.idiomatic: Replied: 'Qin law heavy, your excellency as Fanyang magistrate ten years, killed person father, orphaned person son, broke person feet, tattooed person head, cannot count.

s0057.chinese: 然而慈父孝子莫敢倳刃公之腹中者，畏秦法耳。
s0057.literal: However kind fathers filial sons none dare stab blade lord abdomen middle, feared Qin law only.
s0057.idiomatic: However kind fathers filial sons none dare stab blade lord abdomen middle, feared Qin law only.

s0058.chinese: 今天下大亂，秦法不施，然則慈父孝子且倳刃公之腹中以成其名，此臣之所以弔公也。
s0058.literal: Now world greatly chaotic, Qin law not applied, then kind fathers filial sons moreover stab blade lord abdomen middle to complete their name, this minister what condole lord.'
s0058.idiomatic: Now world greatly chaotic, Qin law not applied, then kind fathers filial sons moreover stab blade lord abdomen middle to complete their name, this minister what condole lord.'

s0059.chinese: 今諸侯畔秦矣，武信君兵且至，而君堅守范陽，少年皆爭殺君，下武信君。
s0059.literal: Now feudal lords rebelled Qin, Wu Xin Jun troops moreover arrived, yet lord firmly guard Fanyang, youths all contend kill lord, down Wu Xin Jun.
s0059.idiomatic: Now feudal lords rebelled Qin, Wu Xin Jun troops moreover arrived, yet lord firmly guard Fanyang, youths all contend kill lord, down Wu Xin Jun.

s0060.chinese: 君急遣臣見武信君，可轉禍為福，在今矣。」
s0060.literal: Lord urgent send minister see Wu Xin Jun, can turn calamity to fortune, at now.'
s0060.idiomatic: Lord urgent send minister see Wu Xin Jun, can turn calamity to fortune, at now.'

s0062.chinese: 范陽令乃使蒯通見武信君曰：「足下必將戰勝然後略地，攻得然後下城，臣竊以為過矣。
s0062.literal: Fanyang magistrate then made Kuai Tong see Wu Xin Jun: 'Your excellency certainly will battle victory then attack land, attack get then down city, minister secretly considers over.
s0062.idiomatic: Fanyang magistrate then made Kuai Tong see Wu Xin Jun: 'Your excellency certainly will battle victory then attack land, attack get then down city, minister secretly considers over.

s0063.chinese: 誠聽臣之計，可不攻而降城，不戰而略地，傳檄而千里定，可乎？」
s0063.literal: Truly listen minister plan, can not attack down city, not battle attack land, transmit notice then thousand li settle, possible?'
s0063.idiomatic: Truly listen minister plan, can not attack down city, not battle attack land, transmit notice then thousand li settle, possible?'

s0065.chinese: 蒯通曰：「今范陽令宜整頓其士卒以守戰者也，怯而畏死，貪而重富貴，故欲先天下降，畏君以為秦所置吏，誅殺如前十城也。
s0065.literal: Kuai Tong said: 'Now Fanyang magistrate should arrange his soldiers guard battle, cowardly fear death, greedy heavy rich noble, thus wish first heaven down surrender, fear lord as Qin placed official, execute kill like previous ten cities.
s0065.idiomatic: Kuai Tong said: 'Now Fanyang magistrate should arrange his soldiers guard battle, cowardly fear death, greedy heavy rich noble, thus wish first heaven down surrender, fear lord as Qin placed official, execute kill like previous ten cities.

s0066.chinese: 然今范陽少年亦方殺其令，自以城距君。
s0066.literal: However now Fanyang youths also just kill their magistrate, self with city resist lord.
s0066.idiomatic: However now Fanyang youths also just kill their magistrate, self with city resist lord.

s0067.chinese: 君何不齎臣侯印，拜范陽令，范陽令則以城下君，少年亦不敢殺其令。
s0067.literal: Lord why not carry minister marquis seal, appoint Fanyang magistrate, Fanyang magistrate then with city down lord, youths also dare not kill their magistrate.
s0067.idiomatic: Lord why not carry minister marquis seal, appoint Fanyang magistrate, Fanyang magistrate then with city down lord, youths also dare not kill their magistrate.

s0068.chinese: 令范陽令乘朱輪華轂，使驅馳燕、趙郊。
s0068.literal: Make Fanyang magistrate ride red wheel splendid carriage, make drive gallop Yan, Zhao suburbs.
s0068.idiomatic: Make Fanyang magistrate ride red wheel splendid carriage, make drive gallop Yan, Zhao suburbs.

s0069.chinese: 燕、趙郊見之，皆曰此范陽令，先下者也，即喜矣，燕、趙城可毋戰而降也。
s0069.literal: Yan, Zhao suburbs see it, all say this Fanyang magistrate, first down one, then happy, Yan, Zhao cities can no battle down.'
s0069.idiomatic: Yan, Zhao suburbs see it, all say this Fanyang magistrate, first down one, then happy, Yan, Zhao cities can no battle down.'

s0070.chinese: 此臣之所謂傳檄而千里定者也。」
s0070.literal: This minister what called transmit notice thousand li settle.'
s0070.idiomatic: This minister what called transmit notice thousand li settle.'

s0071.chinese: 武信君從其計，因使蒯通賜范陽令侯印。
s0071.literal: Wu Xin Jun from his plan, because made Kuai Tong grant Fanyang magistrate marquis seal.
s0071.idiomatic: Wu Xin Jun from his plan, because made Kuai Tong grant Fanyang magistrate marquis seal.

s0072.chinese: 趙地聞之，不戰以城下者三十餘城。
s0072.literal: Zhao land heard it, not battle with city down thirty plus cities.
s0072.idiomatic: Zhao land heard it, not battle with city down thirty plus cities.

s0073.chinese: 至邯鄲，張耳、陳餘聞周章軍入關，至戲卻；
s0073.literal: Arrived Handan, Zhang Er, Chen Yu heard Zhou Zhang army enter pass, to Xi retreated;
s0073.idiomatic: Arrived Handan, Zhang Er, Chen Yu heard Zhou Zhang army enter pass, to Xi retreated;

s0074.chinese: 又聞諸將為陳王徇地，多以讒毀得罪誅，怨陳王不其筴不以為將而以為校尉。
s0074.literal: Again heard various generals for Chen king attack land, many with slander destroyed got crime executed, resented Chen king not treat them not as general but as colonel.
s0074.idiomatic: Again heard various generals for Chen king attack land, many with slander destroyed got crime executed, resented Chen king not treat them not as general but as colonel.

s0075.chinese: 乃說武臣曰：「陳王起蘄，至陳而王，非必立六國後。
s0075.literal: Then persuaded Wu Chen: 'Chen king rose Qi, arrived Chen king, not necessarily establish six states posterity.
s0075.idiomatic: Then persuaded Wu Chen: 'Chen king rose Qi, arrived Chen king, not necessarily establish six states posterity.

s0076.chinese: 將軍今以三千人下趙數十城，獨介居河北，不王無以填之。
s0076.literal: General now with three thousand down Zhao several ten cities, alone isolated dwell Hebei, not king no fill it.
s0076.idiomatic: General now with three thousand down Zhao several ten cities, alone isolated dwell Hebei, not king no fill it.

s0077.chinese: 且陳王聽讒，還報，恐不脫於禍。
s0077.literal: Moreover Chen king listen slander, returned report, fear not escape calamity.
s0077.idiomatic: Moreover Chen king listen slander, returned report, fear not escape calamity.

s0078.literal: Again not equal establish his brothers;
s0078.idiomatic: Again not equal establish his brothers;

s0080.chinese: 將軍毋失時，時閒不容息。」
s0080.literal: General no lose time, time gap not allow rest.'
s0080.idiomatic: General no lose time, time gap not allow rest.'

s0081.chinese: 武臣乃聽之，遂立為趙王。
s0081.literal: Wu Chen then listened, then established as Zhao king.
s0081.idiomatic: Wu Chen then listened, then established as Zhao king.

s0082.chinese: 以陳餘為大將軍，張耳為右丞相，邵騷為左丞相。
s0082.literal: With Chen Yu as great general, Zhang Er as right chancellor, Shao Sao as left chancellor.
s0082.idiomatic: With Chen Yu as great general, Zhang Er as right chancellor, Shao Sao as left chancellor.

s0083.chinese: 使人報陳王，陳王大怒，欲盡族武臣等家，而發兵擊趙。
s0083.literal: Made people report Chen king, Chen king greatly angered, wished exterminate Wu Chen etc. family, yet send troops attack Zhao.
s0083.idiomatic: Made people report Chen king, Chen king greatly angered, wished exterminate Wu Chen etc. family, yet send troops attack Zhao.

s0084.chinese: 陳王相國房君諫曰：「秦未亡而誅武臣等家，此又生一秦也。
s0084.literal: Chen king chancellor Guo Jun advised: 'Qin not perished execute Wu Chen etc. family, this again give birth one Qin.
s0084.idiomatic: Chen king chancellor Guo Jun advised: 'Qin not perished execute Wu Chen etc. family, this again give birth one Qin.

s0085.chinese: 不如因而賀之，使急引兵西擊秦。」
s0085.literal: Not equal because congratulate them, make urgent led troops west attack Qin.'
s0085.idiomatic: Not equal because congratulate them, make urgent led troops west attack Qin.'

s0086.chinese: 陳王然之，從其計，徙系武臣等家宮中，封張耳子敖為成都君。
s0086.literal: Chen king yes, from his plan, moved imprisoned Wu Chen etc. family palace middle, sealed Zhang Er son Ao as Chengdu jun.
s0086.idiomatic: Chen king yes, from his plan, moved imprisoned Wu Chen etc. family palace middle, sealed Zhang Er son Ao as Chengdu jun.

s0087.chinese: 陳王使使者賀趙，令趣發兵西入關。
s0087.literal: Chen king made envoy congratulate Zhao, commanded hasten send troops west enter pass.
s0087.idiomatic: Chen king made envoy congratulate Zhao, commanded hasten send troops west enter pass.

s0088.chinese: 張耳、陳餘說武臣曰：「王王趙，非楚意，特以計賀王。
s0088.literal: Zhang Er, Chen Yu persuaded Wu Chen: 'King king Zhao, not Chu intent, special with plan congratulate king.
s0088.idiomatic: Zhang Er, Chen Yu persuaded Wu Chen: 'King king Zhao, not Chu intent, special with plan congratulate king.

s0089.literal: Chu already extinguished Qin, certainly add troops to Zhao.
s0089.idiomatic: Chu already extinguished Qin, certainly add troops to Zhao.

s0090.chinese: 願王毋西兵，北徇燕、代，南收河內以自廣。
s0090.literal: Wish king no west troops, north attack Yan, Dai, south collect Henan to self broaden.
s0090.idiomatic: Wish king no west troops, north attack Yan, Dai, south collect Henan to self broaden.

s0091.chinese: 趙南據大河，北有燕、代，楚雖勝秦，必不敢制趙。」
s0091.literal: Zhao south occupy great river, north have Yan, Dai, Chu though victory Qin, certainly dare not control Zhao.'
s0091.idiomatic: Zhao south occupy great river, north have Yan, Dai, Chu though victory Qin, certainly dare not control Zhao.'

s0092.chinese: 趙王以為然，因不西兵，而使韓廣略燕，李良略常山，張黡略上黨。
s0092.literal: Zhao king considered yes, because not west troops, yet made Han Guang attack Yan, Li Liang attack Changshan, Zhang Yi attack Shangdang.
s0092.idiomatic: Zhao king considered yes, because not west troops, yet made Han Guang attack Yan, Li Liang attack Changshan, Zhang Yi attack Shangdang.

s0093.chinese: 韓廣至燕，燕人因立廣為燕王。
s0093.literal: Han Guang arrived Yan, Yan people because established Guang as Yan king.
s0093.idiomatic: Han Guang arrived Yan, Yan people because established Guang as Yan king.

s0094.chinese: 趙王乃與張耳、陳餘北略地燕界。
s0094.literal: Zhao king then with Zhang Er, Chen Yu north attack land Yan border.
s0094.idiomatic: Zhao king then with Zhang Er, Chen Yu north attack land Yan border.

s0095.literal: Zhao king idle out, by Yan army obtained.
s0095.idiomatic: Zhao king idle out, by Yan army obtained.

s0096.chinese: 燕將囚之，欲與分趙地半，乃歸王。
s0096.literal: Yan general imprisoned him, wished with divide Zhao land half, then return king.
s0096.idiomatic: Yan general imprisoned him, wished with divide Zhao land half, then return king.

s0097.chinese: 使者往，燕輒殺之以求地。
s0097.literal: Envoys went, Yan then killed to seek land.
s0097.idiomatic: Envoys went, Yan then killed to seek land.

s0099.chinese: 有廝養卒謝其舍中曰：「吾為公說燕，與趙王載歸。」
s0099.literal: Had servant raised soldier Xie his quarters middle: 'I for you persuade Yan, with Zhao king carriage return.'
s0099.idiomatic: Had servant raised soldier Xie his quarters middle: 'I for you persuade Yan, with Zhao king carriage return.'

s0100.chinese: 舍中皆笑曰：「使者往十餘輩，輒死，若何以能得王？」
s0100.literal: Quarters middle all laughed: 'Envoys went ten plus, then died, how able get king?'
s0100.idiomatic: Quarters middle all laughed: 'Envoys went ten plus, then died, how able get king?'

s0102.chinese: 燕將見之，問燕將曰：「知臣何欲？」
s0102.literal: Yan general saw him, asked Yan general: 'Know minister what desire?'
s0102.idiomatic: Yan general saw him, asked Yan general: 'Know minister what desire?'

s0103.literal: Yan general said: 'If desire get Zhao king only.'
s0103.idiomatic: Yan general said: 'If desire get Zhao king only.'

s0104.chinese: 曰：「君知張耳、陳餘何如人也？」
s0104.literal: Said: 'Lord know Zhang Er, Chen Yu what like people?'
s0104.idiomatic: Said: 'Lord know Zhang Er, Chen Yu what like people?'

s0108.chinese: 趙養卒乃笑曰：「君未知此兩人所欲也。
s0108.literal: Zhao servant soldier then laughed: 'Lord unknown this two people what desire.
s0108.idiomatic: Zhao servant soldier then laughed: 'Lord unknown this two people what desire.

s0109.chinese: 夫武臣、張耳、陳餘杖馬箠下趙數十城，此亦各欲南面而王，豈欲為卿相終己邪？
s0109.literal: Wu Chen, Zhang Er, Chen Yu leaned horse stick down Zhao several ten cities, this also each desire south face king, how desire for minister chancellor end self?
s0109.idiomatic: Wu Chen, Zhang Er, Chen Yu leaned horse stick down Zhao several ten cities, this also each desire south face king, how desire for minister chancellor end self?

s0110.chinese: 夫臣與主豈可同日而道哉，顧其勢初定，未敢參分而王，且以少長先立武臣為王，以持趙心。
s0110.literal: Minister and lord how comparable same day speak, look their situation initial settled, not dare divide three king, moreover with young old first establish Wu Chen as king, to hold Zhao heart.
s0110.idiomatic: Minister and lord how comparable same day speak, look their situation initial settled, not dare divide three king, moreover with young old first establish Wu Chen as king, to hold Zhao heart.

s0111.chinese: 今趙地已服，此兩人亦欲分趙而王，時未可耳。
s0111.literal: Now Zhao land already submit, this two people also desire divide Zhao king, time not possible only.
s0111.idiomatic: Now Zhao land already submit, this two people also desire divide Zhao king, time not possible only.

s0112.literal: Now lord then imprisoned Zhao king.
s0112.idiomatic: Now lord then imprisoned Zhao king.

s0113.chinese: 此兩人名為求趙王，實欲燕殺之，此兩人分趙自立。
s0113.literal: This two people name seek Zhao king, real desire Yan kill him, this two people divide Zhao self establish.
s0113.idiomatic: This two people name seek Zhao king, real desire Yan kill him, this two people divide Zhao self establish.

s0114.chinese: 夫以一趙尚易燕，況以兩賢王左提右挈，而責殺王之罪，滅燕易矣。」
s0114.literal: With one Zhao still easy Yan, moreover with two worthy kings left hold right lead, yet blame kill king crime, extinguish Yan easy.'
s0114.idiomatic: With one Zhao still easy Yan, moreover with two worthy kings left hold right lead, yet blame kill king crime, extinguish Yan easy.'

s0115.chinese: 燕將以為然，乃歸趙王，養卒為御而歸。
s0115.literal: Yan general considered yes, then returned Zhao king, servant soldier as charioteer returned.
s0115.idiomatic: Yan general considered yes, then returned Zhao king, servant soldier as charioteer returned.

s0116.chinese: 李良已定常山，還報，趙王復使良略太原。
s0116.literal: Li Liang already settled Changshan, returned reported, Zhao king again made Liang attack Taiyuan.
s0116.idiomatic: Li Liang already settled Changshan, returned reported, Zhao king again made Liang attack Taiyuan.

s0117.chinese: 至石邑，秦兵塞井陘，未能前。
s0117.literal: Arrived Shiyi, Qin troops blocked Jingxing, not able advance.
s0117.idiomatic: Arrived Shiyi, Qin troops blocked Jingxing, not able advance.

s0118.chinese: 秦將詐稱二世使人遺李良書，不封，曰：「良嘗事我得顯幸。
s0118.literal: Qin general falsely claimed Second Emperor sent people gave Li Liang letter, not sealed, said: 'Liang once served me got eminent favored.
s0118.idiomatic: Qin general falsely claimed Second Emperor sent people gave Li Liang letter, not sealed, said: 'Liang once served me got eminent favored.

s0119.chinese: 良誠能反趙為秦，赦良罪，貴良。」
s0119.literal: Liang truly able rebel Zhao for Qin, pardon Liang crime, noble Liang.'
s0119.idiomatic: Liang truly able rebel Zhao for Qin, pardon Liang crime, noble Liang.'

s0120.literal: Liang got letter, doubted not believed.
s0120.idiomatic: Liang got letter, doubted not believed.

s0121.literal: Then returned Handan, increased requested troops.
s0121.idiomatic: Then returned Handan, increased requested troops.

s0122.chinese: 未至，道逢趙王姊出飲，從百餘騎。
s0122.literal: Not arrived, road met Zhao king sister out drink, from hundred plus riders.
s0122.idiomatic: Not arrived, road met Zhao king sister out drink, from hundred plus riders.

s0123.chinese: 李良望見，以為王，伏謁道旁。
s0123.literal: Li Liang gazed saw, considered king, prostrated met road side.
s0123.idiomatic: Li Liang gazed saw, considered king, prostrated met road side.

s0124.chinese: 王姊醉，不知其將，使騎謝李良。
s0124.literal: King sister drunk, not knew his general, made rider thank Li Liang.
s0124.idiomatic: King sister drunk, not knew his general, made rider thank Li Liang.

s0125.literal: Li Liang originally noble, rose, ashamed his following officials.
s0125.idiomatic: Li Liang originally noble, rose, ashamed his following officials.

s0126.chinese: 從官有一人曰：「天下畔秦，能者先立。
s0126.literal: Following officials had one person said: 'World rebelled Qin, able ones first establish.
s0126.idiomatic: Following officials had one person said: 'World rebelled Qin, able ones first establish.

s0127.chinese: 且趙王素出將軍下，今女兒乃不為將軍下車，請追殺之。」
s0127.literal: Moreover Zhao king originally out general under, now woman then not for general alight carriage, please pursue kill her.'
s0127.idiomatic: Moreover Zhao king originally out general under, now woman then not for general alight carriage, please pursue kill her.'

s0128.chinese: 李良已得秦書，固欲反趙，未決，因此怒，遣人追殺王姊道中，乃遂將其兵襲邯鄲。
s0128.literal: Li Liang already got Qin letter, firmly wished rebel Zhao, not decided, because this angered, sent people pursue kill king sister road middle, then thus led his troops attack Handan.
s0128.idiomatic: Li Liang already got Qin letter, firmly wished rebel Zhao, not decided, because this angered, sent people pursue kill king sister road middle, then thus led his troops attack Handan.

s0129.chinese: 邯鄲不知，竟殺武臣、邵騷。
s0129.literal: Handan not knew, unexpectedly killed Wu Chen, Shao Sao.
s0129.idiomatic: Handan not knew, unexpectedly killed Wu Chen, Shao Sao.

s0130.chinese: 趙人多為張耳、陳餘耳目者，以故得脫出。
s0130.literal: Zhao people many for Zhang Er, Chen Yu eyes ears, because got escape out.
s0130.idiomatic: Zhao people many for Zhang Er, Chen Yu eyes ears, because got escape out.

s0131.literal: Collected their troops, got several ten thousand persons.
s0131.idiomatic: Collected their troops, got several ten thousand persons.

s0132.chinese: 客有說張耳曰：「兩君羈旅，而欲附趙，難；
s0132.literal: Guest had persuaded Zhang Er: 'Two lords wandering, wish attach Zhao, difficult;
s0132.idiomatic: Guest had persuaded Zhang Er: 'Two lords wandering, wish attach Zhao, difficult;

s0133.chinese: 獨立趙後，扶以義，可就功。」
s0133.literal: Alone establish Zhao posterity, support with righteousness, can achieve merit.'
s0133.idiomatic: Alone establish Zhao posterity, support with righteousness, can achieve merit.'

s0134.chinese: 乃求得趙歇，立為趙王，居信都。
s0134.literal: Then sought got Zhao Xie, established as Zhao king, dwelt Xindu.
s0134.idiomatic: Then sought got Zhao Xie, established as Zhao king, dwelt Xindu.

s0135.chinese: 李良進兵擊陳餘，陳餘敗李良，李良走歸章邯。
s0135.literal: Li Liang advanced troops attacked Chen Yu, Chen Yu defeated Li Liang, Li Liang fled returned Zhang Han.
s0135.idiomatic: Li Liang advanced troops attacked Chen Yu, Chen Yu defeated Li Liang, Li Liang fled returned Zhang Han.

s0136.chinese: 章邯引兵至邯鄲，皆徙其民河內，夷其城郭。
s0136.literal: Zhang Han led troops arrived Handan, all moved its people Henan, razed its city walls.
s0136.idiomatic: Zhang Han led troops arrived Handan, all moved its people Henan, razed its city walls.

s0137.chinese: 張耳與趙王歇走入鉅鹿城，王離圍之。
s0137.literal: Zhang Er with Zhao king Xie fled entered Julu city, Wang Li surrounded it.
s0137.idiomatic: Zhang Er with Zhao king Xie fled entered Julu city, Wang Li surrounded it.

s0138.chinese: 陳餘北收常山兵，得數萬人，軍鉅鹿北。
s0138.literal: Chen Yu north collected Changshan troops, got several ten thousand persons, army Julu north.
s0138.idiomatic: Chen Yu north collected Changshan troops, got several ten thousand persons, army Julu north.

s0139.chinese: 章邯軍鉅鹿南棘原，筑甬道屬河，餉王離。
s0139.literal: Zhang Han army Julu south Jiyuan, built passageway connected river, supplied Wang Li.
s0139.idiomatic: Zhang Han army Julu south Jiyuan, built passageway connected river, supplied Wang Li.

s0140.literal: Wang Li troops provisions many, urgent attacked Julu.
s0140.idiomatic: Wang Li troops provisions many, urgent attacked Julu.

s0141.chinese: 鉅鹿城中食盡兵少，張耳數使人召前陳餘，陳餘自度兵少，不敵秦，不敢前。
s0141.literal: Julu city middle provisions exhausted troops few, Zhang Er several times sent people summoned former Chen Yu, Chen Yu self measured troops few, not enemy Qin, dared not advance.
s0141.idiomatic: Julu city middle provisions exhausted troops few, Zhang Er several times sent people summoned former Chen Yu, Chen Yu self measured troops few, not enemy Qin, dared not advance.

s0142.chinese: 數月，張耳大怒，怨陳餘，使張黶、陳澤往讓陳餘曰：「始吾與公為刎頸交，今王與耳旦暮且死，而公擁兵數萬，不肯相救，安在其相為死！
s0142.literal: Several months, Zhang Er greatly angered, resented Chen Yu, made Zhang Yi, Chen Ze went reproached Chen Yu: 'Beginning I with you became neck-cutting friendship, now king with Er morning evening then die, yet you possess troops several ten thousand, not willing mutually save, where its mutually die!
s0142.idiomatic: Several months, Zhang Er greatly angered, resented Chen Yu, made Zhang Yi, Chen Ze went reproached Chen Yu: 'Beginning I with you became neck-cutting friendship, now king with Er morning evening then die, yet you possess troops several ten thousand, not willing mutually save, where its mutually die!

s0143.chinese: 茍必信，胡不赴秦軍俱死？
s0143.literal: If certainly trust, why not go Qin army together die?
s0143.idiomatic: If certainly trust, why not go Qin army together die?

s0144.literal: Moreover have one ten two mutually whole.'
s0144.idiomatic: Moreover have one ten two mutually whole.'

s0145.chinese: 陳餘曰：「吾度前終不能救趙，徒盡亡軍。
s0145.literal: Chen Yu said: 'I measure advance finally cannot save Zhao, in vain exhaust perish army.
s0145.idiomatic: Chen Yu said: 'I measure advance finally cannot save Zhao, in vain exhaust perish army.

s0146.chinese: 且餘所以不俱死，欲為趙王、張君報秦。
s0146.literal: Moreover Yu what not together die, wish for Zhao king, Zhang jun report Qin.
s0146.idiomatic: Moreover Yu what not together die, wish for Zhao king, Zhang jun report Qin.

s0147.chinese: 今必俱死，如以肉委餓虎，何益？」
s0147.literal: Now certainly together die, like with meat give hungry tiger, what benefit?'
s0147.idiomatic: Now certainly together die, like with meat give hungry tiger, what benefit?'

s0148.chinese: 張黶、陳澤曰：「事已急，要以俱死立信，安知後慮！」
s0148.literal: Zhang Yi, Chen Ze said: 'Matter already urgent, important with together die establish trust, how know later consideration!'
s0148.idiomatic: Zhang Yi, Chen Ze said: 'Matter already urgent, important with together die establish trust, how know later consideration!'

s0149.chinese: 陳餘曰：「吾死顧以為無益。
s0149.literal: Chen Yu said: 'I die consider as no benefit.
s0149.idiomatic: Chen Yu said: 'I die consider as no benefit.

s0151.chinese: 乃使五千人令張黶、陳澤先嘗秦軍，至皆沒。
s0151.literal: Then made five thousand commanded Zhang Yi, Chen Ze first test Qin army, arrived all perished.
s0151.idiomatic: Then made five thousand commanded Zhang Yi, Chen Ze first test Qin army, arrived all perished.

s0152.chinese: 當是時，燕、齊、楚聞趙急，皆來救。
s0152.literal: When this time, Yan, Qi, Chu heard Zhao urgent, all came save.
s0152.idiomatic: When this time, Yan, Qi, Chu heard Zhao urgent, all came save.

s0153.chinese: 張敖亦北收代兵，得萬餘人，來，皆壁餘旁，未敢擊秦。
s0153.literal: Zhang Ao also north collected Dai troops, got ten thousand plus persons, came, all walled Chen Yu side, not dared attack Qin.
s0153.idiomatic: Zhang Ao also north collected Dai troops, got ten thousand plus persons, came, all walled Chen Yu side, not dared attack Qin.

s0154.chinese: 項羽兵數絕章邯甬道，王離軍乏食，項羽悉引兵渡河，遂破章邯。
s0154.literal: Xiang Yu troops several times cut Zhang Han passageway, Wang Li army lacked provisions, Xiang Yu all led troops crossed river, then broke Zhang Han.
s0154.idiomatic: Xiang Yu troops several times cut Zhang Han passageway, Wang Li army lacked provisions, Xiang Yu all led troops crossed river, then broke Zhang Han.

s0155.chinese: 章邯引兵解，諸侯軍乃敢擊圍鉅鹿秦軍，遂虜王離。
s0155.literal: Zhang Han led troops retreated, various lords army then dared attack surrounded Julu Qin army, then captured Wang Li.
s0155.idiomatic: Zhang Han led troops retreated, various lords army then dared attack surrounded Julu Qin army, then captured Wang Li.

s0158.chinese: 於是趙王歇、張耳乃得出鉅鹿，謝諸侯。
s0158.literal: Then Zhao king Xie, Zhang Er then able exit Julu, thanked various lords.
s0158.idiomatic: Then Zhao king Xie, Zhang Er then able exit Julu, thanked various lords.

s0159.chinese: 張耳與陳餘相見，責讓陳餘以不肯救趙，及問張黶、陳澤所在。
s0159.literal: Zhang Er with Chen Yu met, blamed reproached Chen Yu with not willing save Zhao, and asked Zhang Yi, Chen Ze location.
s0159.idiomatic: Zhang Er with Chen Yu met, blamed reproached Chen Yu with not willing save Zhao, and asked Zhang Yi, Chen Ze location.

s0160.chinese: 陳餘怒曰：「張黶、陳澤以必死責臣，臣使將五千人先嘗秦軍，皆沒不出。」
s0160.literal: Chen Yu angered: 'Zhang Yi, Chen Ze with certain die blamed minister, minister made lead five thousand first test Qin army, all perished not out.'
s0160.idiomatic: Chen Yu angered: 'Zhang Yi, Chen Ze with certain die blamed minister, minister made lead five thousand first test Qin army, all perished not out.'

s0161.chinese: 張耳不信，以為殺之，數問陳餘。
s0161.literal: Zhang Er not believed, considered killed them, several times asked Chen Yu.
s0161.idiomatic: Zhang Er not believed, considered killed them, several times asked Chen Yu.

s0162.chinese: 陳餘怒曰：「不意君之望臣深也！
s0162.literal: Chen Yu angered: 'Not expected lord hope minister deep!
s0162.idiomatic: Chen Yu angered: 'Not expected lord hope minister deep!

s0163.literal: How with minister heavy abandon general?'
s0163.idiomatic: How with minister heavy abandon general?'

s0164.literal: Then removed untied seal ribbon, pushed gave Zhang Er.
s0164.idiomatic: Then removed untied seal ribbon, pushed gave Zhang Er.

s0165.literal: Zhang Er also astonished not accepted.
s0165.idiomatic: Zhang Er also astonished not accepted.

s0167.chinese: 客有說張耳曰：「臣聞『天與不取，反受其咎』。
s0167.literal: Guest had persuaded Zhang Er: 'Minister heard 'Heaven give not take, instead receive its misfortune'.
s0167.idiomatic: Guest had persuaded Zhang Er: 'Minister heard 'Heaven give not take, instead receive its misfortune'.

s0168.chinese: 今陳將軍與君印，君不受，反天不祥。
s0168.literal: Now Chen general give lord seal, lord not accept, instead heaven not auspicious.
s0168.idiomatic: Now Chen general give lord seal, lord not accept, instead heaven not auspicious.

s0170.chinese: 張耳乃佩其印，收其麾下。
s0170.literal: Zhang Er then wore his seal, collected his banner under.
s0170.idiomatic: Zhang Er then wore his seal, collected his banner under.

s0171.chinese: 而陳餘還，亦望張耳不讓，遂趨出。
s0171.literal: Yet Chen Yu returned, also hoped Zhang Er not yield, then hurried out.
s0171.idiomatic: Yet Chen Yu returned, also hoped Zhang Er not yield, then hurried out.

s0172.literal: Zhang Er then collected his troops.
s0172.idiomatic: Zhang Er then collected his troops.

s0173.chinese: 陳餘獨與麾下所善數百人之河上澤中漁獵。
s0173.literal: Chen Yu alone with banner under good several hundred persons river upper marsh middle fished hunted.
s0173.idiomatic: Chen Yu alone with banner under good several hundred persons river upper marsh middle fished hunted.

s0174.literal: By this Chen Yu, Zhang Er then had rift.
s0174.idiomatic: By this Chen Yu, Zhang Er then had rift.

s0175.literal: Zhao king Xie again dwelt Xindu.
s0175.idiomatic: Zhao king Xie again dwelt Xindu.

s0176.literal: Zhang Er followed Xiang Yu various lords entered pass.
s0176.idiomatic: Zhang Er followed Xiang Yu various lords entered pass.

s0177.chinese: 漢元年二月，項羽立諸侯王，張耳雅游，人多為之言，項羽亦素數聞張耳賢，乃分趙立張耳為常山王，治信都。
s0177.literal: Han first year second month, Xiang Yu established various lords kings, Zhang Er elegantly wandered, people many for him spoke, Xiang Yu also originally several times heard Zhang Er worthy, then divided Zhao established Zhang Er as Changshan king, governed Xindu.
s0177.idiomatic: Han first year second month, Xiang Yu established various lords kings, Zhang Er elegantly wandered, people many for him spoke, Xiang Yu also originally several times heard Zhang Er worthy, then divided Zhao established Zhang Er as Changshan king, governed Xindu.

s0179.chinese: 陳餘客多說項羽曰：「陳餘、張耳一體有功於趙。」
s0179.literal: Chen Yu guests many persuaded Xiang Yu: 'Chen Yu, Zhang Er one body have merit to Zhao.'
s0179.idiomatic: Chen Yu guests many persuaded Xiang Yu: 'Chen Yu, Zhang Er one body have merit to Zhao.'

s0180.chinese: 項羽以陳餘不從入關，聞其在南皮，即以南皮旁三縣以封之，而徙趙王歇王代。
s0180.literal: Xiang Yu because Chen Yu not followed entered pass, heard him at Nanpi, then with Nanpi side three counties sealed him, yet moved Zhao king Xie king Dai.
s0180.idiomatic: Xiang Yu because Chen Yu not followed entered pass, heard him at Nanpi, then with Nanpi side three counties sealed him, yet moved Zhao king Xie king Dai.

s0181.chinese: 張耳之國，陳餘愈益怒，曰：「張耳與餘功等也，今張耳王，餘獨侯，此項羽不平。」
s0181.literal: Zhang Er to country, Chen Yu increasingly angered, said: 'Zhang Er with Yu merit equal, now Zhang Er king, Yu alone marquis, this Xiang Yu not fair.'
s0181.idiomatic: Zhang Er to country, Chen Yu increasingly angered, said: 'Zhang Er with Yu merit equal, now Zhang Er king, Yu alone marquis, this Xiang Yu not fair.'

s0182.chinese: 及齊王田榮畔楚，陳餘乃使夏說說田榮曰：「項羽為天下宰不平，盡王諸將善地，徙故王王惡地，今趙王乃居代！
s0182.literal: When Qi king Tian Rong rebelled Chu, Chen Yu then made Xia Shuo persuade Tian Rong: 'Xiang Yu as world overseer not fair, exhausted king various generals good land, moved former kings king bad land, now Zhao king then dwelt Dai!
s0182.idiomatic: When Qi king Tian Rong rebelled Chu, Chen Yu then made Xia Shuo persuade Tian Rong: 'Xiang Yu as world overseer not fair, exhausted king various generals good land, moved former kings king bad land, now Zhao king then dwelt Dai!

s0183.chinese: 願王假臣兵，請以南皮為捍蔽。」
